snippet: The United States is adding Mali to the list of countries whose travelers get special Ebola screening after a number of cases  in the West African nation, the government said on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Heightens Ebola Screening for Travelers From Mali
headline.main: U.S. Heightens Ebola Screening for Travelers From Mali

lead_paragraph: The United States is adding Mali to the list of countries whose travelers get special Ebola screening after a number of cases  in the West African nation, the government said on Sunday.
